column2:
"Oh, so this is what the cuties
think of me, meow!
Tell me, tell me..."
"...ugh, ack... I thought this would make me feel all kinds of good, but that was a big mistake, meow!"

"Not even one day on the road to harem!
Protagonists of all times and places
have overcame steep hurdles, meow!"

"If I'm going to act as ARKS,
then I've got to be loved by everyone!
Which means you!"

"I'll give you my partner card, meow!
I want you to support my life as an
ARKS, meow!"
